questions.questionTitle: What is the main purpose of the discussion?
What does the woman plan to do?

script:
� Hey Lila, is that you under all those papers?
� Yes Brandon, it's me. I'm grading final exams for my world literature class. It's exhausting!
� Tell me about it. I was up 'til two last night marking finals for my American History students.
� I'll be so glad when this semester's finally over! I'm going to do nothing but sleep during the break.
